^(call_id)$.description: CallID is the unique identifier of the cell call.

^(doc_results)$.description: DocResults are doc results for a cell returned by, e.g., file search

^(execution_summary)$.description: ExecutionSummary is the summary of the cell execution, e.g. success/failure and execution time.

^(language_id)$.description: LanguageID is the language of the cell.

^(ref_id)$.description: RefID is the agent's original unique identifier.

^(text_range)$.description: TextRange is the range of the cell covering in the markdown source.

callId.description: CallID is the unique identifier of the cell call.

docResults.description: DocResults are doc results for a cell returned by, e.g., file search

executionSummary.description: ExecutionSummary is the summary of the cell execution, e.g. success/failure and execution time.

kind.description: CellKind is the type of cell, e.g. markup or code.
kind.title: Cell Kind

languageId.description: LanguageID is the language of the cell.

metadata.description: Metadata is additional metadata about the cell in k/v format.

outputs.description: Outputs are the outputs of the cell, e.g. stdout, stderr, or other media types.

refId.description: RefID is the agent's original unique identifier.

role.description: Role is the role of the cell, e.g. user or assistant.
role.title: Cell Role

textRange.description: TextRange is the range of the cell covering in the markdown source.

value.description: Value is the contents of the cell.
